articles.headline: Tom Brady wins inaugural Fanatics Games, $1M prize
articles.description: Tom Brady emerged Sunday as the winner of the inaugural Fanatics Games, which pitted athletes and celebrities against fans in eight competitions this weekend at Fanatics Fest in New York.

articles.headline: Pennsylvania governor to work with Eagles, Steelers on stadium needs
articles.description: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro declined to get into specifics about funding for any new sports arenas -- a possibility with the Eagles' lease set to expire in 2032.

articles.headline: Jayden Daniels card sells for $500,000 to Commanders' Josh Harris
articles.description: Jayden Daniels rookie card sells for $500,000 at Fanatics Fest 2025.

articles.headline: How Puka Nacua, Davante Adams are working together on Rams
articles.description: Sarah Barshop reports on the early bond Davante Adams and Puka Nacua have formed on the Rams.

articles.headline: Fred Smith, ex-Washington NFL team part-owner, FedEx founder, dies
articles.description: Fred Smith, a former minority owner of the Washington NFL franchise and the founder of FedEx Corp., a prominent sponsor across the landscape of sports, has died.

articles.headline: How flag football has revived Chuba Hubbard's Olympic dreams
articles.description: Hubbard set aside his Olympic track goals to reach the NFL, but flag football has revived his chances of competing on the international stage.
